application.description: Application that the new domain libraries will belong to
application.x-prompt: What application will the new domain libraries be under?

domain.description: Name of the domain. Format is parent-domain/child-domain for child domains and domain/shared for parent domains.
domain.x-prompt: What is the name of the domain? Use parent-domain/child-domain format for a child domain. Use domain/shared format for parent domains.

newDomain.x-prompt: What is the name of the new domain? Use parent-domain/child-domain format for a child domain. Use domain/shared format for parent domains.
